Class Flight

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.flight.plane.Flight

    edu.ncsu.csc216.flight.plane.SeatingManager

    public class Flight
extends java.lang.Object
implements edu.ncsu.csc216.flight.plane.SeatingManager
    Flight is the class that represents the airplanes and controls the seats.
    Author:
    Andrew Northrup

      java.lang.String reserveBusinessSeat(boolean prefersWindow)

      java.lang.String reserveEconomySeat(boolean prefersWindow)
      Reserves economy class seat by cycling through seats starting with seat preference, then moving back from last assigned economy row then any seats in economy

      Reserves first class seat by cycling through seats starting with seat preference, then class, then any seats in a lesser class

    • Constructor Detail

      • Flight

        public Flight(java.lang.String filename)
        Constructor for flight, that reads in an airplane file and sets up the flight according to those specifications. If airplane file is not valid an exception is caught.
        Parameters:
        filename - name of the file that the flight is
